label: Node-Red HealthCheck Flow
info:
# Healthcheck Flow

- Provides a simple __HTTP GET__ API `/health`
- Returns __HTTP 200__ response with body "OK"

name: function 1

name: Are all lights off?
func:
let light_count = msg.payload.length

let lights_off_count = msg.payload.filter(light => light.state === 'off').length

msg.payload = light_count == lights_off_count

return msg;

name: Are all lights on?
Are all lights off?
Are all lights off?
func:
let light_count = msg.payload.length

let lights_off_count = msg.payload.filter(light => light.state === 'off').length

msg.payload = light_count == lights_off_count

return msg;

name: Send the "turn_off" message every minute until all lights are confirmed "Off"
Send the "turn_on" message every minute until all lights are confirmed "On"

info: <location>\nUnlocks a door lock at named location. Valid entries are \"Front Door\" or \"Back Door\", case insensitive.\n
<location>\nUnlocks a door lock at named location. Valid entries are \"Front Door\" or \"Back Door\", case insensitive.\n

name: Get status for all doors and locks
Lock or Unlock doors based on passed parameter
Get status of locks after operation
Notify user of unrecognized lock name
Filter to just "/help" command

info:
*Available Commands:*

*Locks*
/doors - door and lock status for all doors

/lock <location>
/unlock <location>
Locks or Unlocks a door lock at named location. Valid entries are "Front Door" or "Back Door", case insensitive.

/lockall - Lock all locks

/nav Provide either GPS coords or Ingress Intel link to have the Tesla navigate

/help - Show this help

name: Get status for all doors and locks

name: Set ReminderSent to True
func:
global.set("ReminderSent", true);

return msg;

name: Check ReminderSent
func:
msg.payload = global.get("ReminderSent");

return msg;

name: If ReminderSent boolean was true, send a message saying Gabby has now been fed
Set ReminderSent to True
func:
global.set("ReminderSent", true);

return msg;

name: Set ReminderSent to False
func:
global.set("ReminderSent", false);

return msg;

name: Set ReminderSent to False
func:
global.set("ReminderSent", false);

return msg;
